data.news_body: Global Education Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Global Education Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Board of Directors in its meeting held on Friday , 26th Sep 2025 has considered and approved the request letter dated 10th Sep 2025 received from the persons/immediate relatives related to Mr. Rishabh Sunil Surana, [Individual Promoter Shareholder] seeking reclassification from  Promoter  Shareholder  to  Public Shareholder  category in terms of Regulation 31A of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ("SEBI (LODR) Regulations").'.
